item.title: GSOC @ GNU MAILMAN WEEK-1
item.description:
Writing things from scratch is hard, isn’t it. You have to think a lot whether to setup all the things first and then actually start doing coding. But I preferred the latter on the former. If you are unaware of what I am working on, you can checkout here.
So, I started by writing the BaseRequest class, the class keyword sounds weird to me when I am dabbling with JS but I can’t help using it as class is the best keyword to describe heirarchy in your code.
BaseRequest is the base request making module. It talks directly to the REST api exposed by the Mailman core i.e it sits at the bottom of the abstraction layer that mailman-client.js

item.title: Demystifying JavaScript Prototypes - I
item.description:
Every JavaScript developer should know about Prototypes and must use it as a part of their JS arsenal. The concept of Prototypes is one of the core concepts of JavaScript.

This article aims to explain JavaScript’s prototype in layman terms. If you don’t understand JavaScript’s prototype after reading this blog post, please ask questions in the comments below. I will personally answer all questions.

item.title: My GSoC proposal -- mailman.client written in JS
item.description: This post will walk you through my proposal for GSoC’15 @ GNU Mailman. Along with, it introduces the Mailman project and it’s parts.

item.title: A list of awesome trackers
item.description: A curated list of some awesome trackers. Keep torrenting :beer:

item.title: It's gsoc'15 with GNU Mailman :-)
item.description: Ah ! there came the moment I have been waiting for the past two years. The list of accepted projects got published on the Google Summer of Code website. And, after two months of consistent hard work, I made it. I will be working with an open source organisation called as GNU Mailman, which is a mailing list management software.

item.title: The Mailman journey for GSoC'15
item.description: The race for getting a GSoC project has started yet again. Tomorrow, will be the proposal submission deadline. I have also submitted a proposal for porting the mailman.client to JavaScript.

item.title: Hi there !!
item.description:
I had been thinking to put a blog up for the past few months but everytime I got stuck with projects, examinations etc. Huh !

Now, fest season is going on at IIT-BHU,Varanasi and we guys have all day free. I guess it’s the best time to go for a blog :D
